input.sentences: a group of friends got together for a study party .
they all brought computers and other electronics .
they stayed up the whole night studying for their college class .
one of them got bored started posting on social media sites instead of studying .
another person got too tired to study and went to sleep on the couch | but everyone kept bugging him .
output.sentences: My friends and I got together to study, but it turned into more of a party.
I visited the electronics store earlier and bought a new computer and a few other useful items.
After some silliness, we hunkered down and stayed up late into the night, studying.
After many hours of studying, we needed a break and we did some social networking to relax.
Finally, as the sun rose, we were very tired from all that study, and we all fell asleep.
